thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Lianchuang Electronic Technology's Controlling Shareholder To Increase Up To 3 Pct Stake

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lianchuang Electronic Technology's Controlling Shareholder To Increase Up To 3 Pct Stake

organizations.name: reuters) - lianchuang electronic technology co ltd

text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Lianchuang Electronic Technology Co Ltd :
* SAYS CONTROLLING SHAREHOLDER PLANS TO INCREASE UP TO 3 PERCENT STAKE IN THE COMPANY FOR UP TO 250 MILLION YUAN ($39.84 million) WITHIN SIX MTHS Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2FQeJac Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2750 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
